snippet: A St. Louis jury on Friday rejected a Tennessee woman's lawsuit that Johnson & Johnson baby powder contributed to her ovarian cancer, a victory for the company after it lost three previous, similar lawsuits in St. Louis....

headline.main: Miriam Colon, Iconic US Latina Movie, Theater Actress, Dies
headline.print_headline: Miriam Colon, Iconic US Latina Movie, Theater Actress, Dies

lead_paragraph: A St. Louis jury on Friday rejected a Tennessee woman's lawsuit that Johnson & Johnson baby powder contributed to her ovarian cancer, a victory for the company after it lost three previous, similar lawsuits in St. Louis.
